gateway

Class DataManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gateway.DataManager

  • public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages reading and writing data stored in each Manager through serializable (.ser) files.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataManager()
      Creates a DataManager with default file paths to each Manager's .ser file.
      DataManager(java.lang.String accountPath, java.lang.String friendPath, java.lang.String conversationPath, java.lang.String eventPath, java.lang.String signupPath)
      Creates a DataManager with specified file paths for each Manager's .ser file.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountManager readAccountManager()
      Reads and returns the AccountManager from the file path specified for its .ser file as an object.
      ConversationManager readConversationManager()
      Reads and returns the ConversationManager from the file path specified for its .ser file as an object.
      EventManager readEventManager()
      Reads and returns the EventManager from the file path specified for its .ser file as an object.
      FriendManager readFriendManager()
      Reads and returns the FriendManager from the file path specified for its .ser file as an object.
      SignupManager readSignupManager()
      Reads and returns the SignupManager from the file path specified for its .ser file as an object.
      void saveAllManagers(EventManager eventManager, AccountManager accountManager, ConversationManager conversationManager, FriendManager friendManager, SignupManager signupManager)
      Calls saveManager on each of the pre-specified Serializable classes used in this program.
      void saveManager(java.lang.String managerName, java.lang.String filePath, java.io.Serializable manager)
      Saves a Serializable Manager object to a .ser file in a specified file path.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataManager

        public DataManager()
        Creates a DataManager with default file paths to each Manager's .ser file.

      • DataManager

        public DataManager(java.lang.String accountPath,
                   java.lang.String friendPath,
                   java.lang.String conversationPath,
                   java.lang.String eventPath,
                   java.lang.String signupPath)
        Creates a DataManager with specified file paths for each Manager's .ser file.
        Parameters:
        accountPath - given path to the AccountManager .ser file
        friendPath - given path to the FriendManager .ser file
        conversationPath - given path to the ConversationManager .ser file
        eventPath - given path to the EventManager .ser file
        signupPath - given path to the SignupManager .ser file

    • Method Detail

      • saveManager

        public void saveManager(java.lang.String managerName,
                        java.lang.String filePath,
                        java.io.Serializable manager)
        Saves a Serializable Manager object to a .ser file in a specified file path. Helper method saveSerializable() is used here. Output of success or failure will be sent to the console.
        Parameters:
        managerName - name of manager to save
        filePath - given file path for the .ser file
        manager - a Serializable manager object

      • saveAllManagers

        public void saveAllManagers(EventManager eventManager,
                            AccountManager accountManager,
                            ConversationManager conversationManager,
                            FriendManager friendManager,
                            SignupManager signupManager)
        Calls saveManager on each of the pre-specified Serializable classes used in this program.
        Parameters:
        eventManager - EventManager class
        accountManager - AccountManager class
        conversationManager - ConversationManager class
        friendManager - FriendManager class
        signupManager - SignupManager class

      • readAccountManager

        public AccountManager readAccountManager()
        Reads and returns the AccountManager from the file path specified for its .ser file as an object. Otherwise, returns a new empty AccountManager.
        Returns:
        an AccountManager object

      • readEventManager

        public EventManager readEventManager()
        Reads and returns the EventManager from the file path specified for its .ser file as an object. Otherwise, returns a new empty EventManager.
        Returns:
        an EventManager object

      • readConversationManager

        public ConversationManager readConversationManager()
        Reads and returns the ConversationManager from the file path specified for its .ser file as an object. Otherwise, returns a new empty ConversationManager.
        Returns:
        an ConversationManager object

      • readFriendManager

        public FriendManager readFriendManager()
        Reads and returns the FriendManager from the file path specified for its .ser file as an object. Otherwise, returns a new empty FriendManager.
        Returns:
        an FriendManager object

      • readSignupManager

        public SignupManager readSignupManager()
        Reads and returns the SignupManager from the file path specified for its .ser file as an object. Otherwise, returns a new empty SignupManager.
        Returns:
        an SignupManager object
